org.sd.text.proximity
Class Keywords

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.text.proximity.Keywords

public class Keywords
extends java.lang.Object

Class to manage a ranked list of keywords.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Detail

getInstance

public static final Keywords getInstance(java.io.File resource)
Get a keywords instance using the given resource.

The resource must have lines of the form |. Blank lines and comment lines (beginning with a '#' sign) are ignored. The counts must be integers sorted from HIGHEST to LOWEST. Currently, keywords are assumed to be lowercase sequences of letters only.

findKeyword

public Keyword findKeyword(java.lang.String input,
                           boolean normalized)
Find the keyword in the input.

Parameters:
input - The input to scan for the keyword.
normalized - true if the input has already been normalized.

Parameters:
input - The input to scan for the keyword.
normalized - true if the input has already been normalized.
